alert.note: Alert for Orange; Riverside (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 03 at 2:32PM PDT until September 03 at 3:15PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Diego has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Riverside County in southern California... East central Orange County in southwestern California... * Until 315 PM PDT. * At 232 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Trabuco Canyon, or 8 miles northeast of Mission Viejo, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Irvine, Mission Viejo, Rancho Santa Margarita, Foothill Ranch, Trabuco Canyon, Silverado, El Toro, Laguna Hills, El Toro Station Cdp and Limestone Canyon Regional Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
